  • java.lang.Object

  • Type Parameters:
    M -
    All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class RuntimeStage<M>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Stage<M,StageConfig>, Lifecycle, StageOutput<M>
    Decorates a Stage instance with some telemetry and bounds checking
